channel.title: Mô Phỏng on Nam's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Mô Phỏng on Nam's Journal

item.title: Mô Phỏng Tên Lửa Điều Chỉnh Vectơ Đẩy trong Python
item.description: Rocketry has always been a fascinating topic for me and I’d love to get into model rocketry because it seems so interesting. Unfortunately, due to where I live, I can’t really get into it due to lack of materials, cost, and local laws. So what’s a guy to do when he wants to get into rocketry but can’t physically do it? He goes the virtual simulation route. I’ll be building a simulation for a simple thrust vector control (TVC) rocket.
